data.text:
@kylenabecker @Emily_Burns_V VERY STUPID..

COMMON SENSE HAS LEFT THE BUILDING  WITH THE LEFT...

@kylenabecker @Emily_Burns_V I think it's more being gullible/naive than stupid. Most people who think masks work believe that because they trust the media and CDC implicitly. They don't see how politicized covid was/is.
@kylenabecker @Emily_Burns_V Common sense goes a long way in life. Critical thinking too.

@KEMmalus @kylenabecker @jamesholden007 @Emily_Burns_V ‘No support that aerosol transmission makes masks useless’, aside from every RCT done on aerosolized viruses before COVID, as well as the couple that have been done since.

But, sure, if you don’t count all of the relative, pertinent literature, there is a lack of support.

@kylenabecker @skis416 @Emily_Burns_V A tiny particle of the virion tho is not likely infectious. Inoculum has to be sufficient and contain spike. 
Not saying masks work more than I'm saying respiratory aerosols have their own limitations.

@kylenabecker @Emily_Burns_V To answer your question we must go to calculus:

Let x = the expression of human stupidity. To find the total of human stupidity we integrate x over the interval from n to ∞, where n is the level of stupidity reached at 11:59 of the current day.

@GPanago2 @kylenabecker @Emily_Burns_V N95 masks don’t have charcoal or any other active ingredient. Therefore they DO NOT work on fumes or vapors. If the CDC doesn’t understand the fundamental difference between particulates and fumes it’s just one more definitive proof they’re full of illiterate apparatchiks.

@kylenabecker @Emily_Burns_V I learned about the cigarette smoke similarity *very* early on. It’s a devastatingly effect comparison that I’ve used many times. The response is usually crickets.

Pro-mask fanatics are cargo cultists who are immune to reason.
